insights.title: TSM & AVGO carrying strong gains
insights.content: Your semiconductor positions (TSM +59%, AVGO +53%) have significantly outperformed. Together they represent meaningful unrealized gains. Consider whether you want to lock in some profits or if you're comfortable letting these ride given AI/chip demand tailwinds.

insights.title: Canadian-heavy but well-diversified
insights.content: Your portfolio is 56% Canadian, 44% US. While this creates some home bias, your ETF choices (XEQT, VDY, XEF) provide underlying global exposure. The geographic split looks intentional rather than accidental.

insights.title: XEQT concentration worth monitoring
insights.content: XEQT at 20.6% is your largest position. This is fine for a core ETF, but keep an eye on it as you add funds â€” you may want to diversify new contributions to other holdings to maintain balance.
